For some years wey don pass, I don see some report wey dey tok about how di kontri of Nigeria get successful domestic film industry. Even as dat fact dey surprise me, I no fit see any Nigerian film wey dey available for me to look at until I scatter dis one for Netflix. To dey honest, I dey expect say I get somethin wey fine well, and e dey true well well. Even as e get some fine shot and/or direction wey show say somethin wey dey make film too much, di film get many shortcomings.

Unfortunately, we no fit bear cowboy pistols, space guns, cut & sow costumes, annoyly talentless filming and unnecessary long form remembrance ceremonies for wey dem don already show footage wey dem butter up wit ridiculously unintelligent revelations of supposed-to-be shockers wey dey apparent from di beginnin.
